errors.error_description: Using 'python2' command instead of 'python3' for creating virtual environment on macOS and Linux, which is incorrect syntax as python2 doesn't support venv module.
correction_candidates: Change 'python2 -m venv env' to 'python3 -m venv env'
Use 'python -m venv env' instead of 'python2 -m venv env'
Replace with 'virtualenv env' command for broader compatibility
Use 'python3.8 -m venv env' to specify exact Python version
errors.golden_answer: Change 'python2 -m venv env' to 'python3 -m venv env'

errors.error_description: Added a specific plotly version (5.2.1) that may be incompatible with the latest dash-bio version, potentially causing version conflicts.
correction_candidates: Remove the plotly version specification to use the latest compatible version
Update to plotly>=5.0.0 to allow newer compatible versions
Use plotly~=5.15.0 for a more recent stable version
Add a note explaining why this specific plotly version is required
errors.golden_answer: Remove the plotly version specification to use the latest compatible version
